Package listener

This contains classes dealing with listening to filesystem directories for file changes and notifying about those changes.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Class Description
FileEvent This class represents an event for a file - modified, created or deleted.
ListenedDirectory This class represents a directory available for listening, enabling definition of regular expressions for files that should be watched.
Listener Abstract class for a filesystem listener, watching for changes.
ListenerImpl This class represents an object capable of listening to filesystem events on pre-specified folders and notify about changes to files.
 

Enum Summary
Enum Description
FileEvents  
 

Package listener Description

This contains classes dealing with listening to filesystem directories for file changes and notifying about those changes.
